data.author: Watson Tungjunyatham

changelog.release_notes:
Version 1.0 is the base release. Everything should be working as intended, but that's what they all say.

You will never escape idol hell!

data.description:
If we want to protect our beloved school, we need to do what we can? We need to become idols!

Love Live! School Idol Watchface is a watchface based on the popular anime franchise, Love Live! Using graphics from the School Idol Diaries series, now you can travel around with all 9 members of μ's. Shake your Pebble and your idol will talk back with a catchphrase! Each idol girl has 2 different graphics to look at, making a total of 18 different graphics to cycle from!

The watchface allows you to configure how often you want to see an idol, at what intervals, and whether you want to enable tap events. Customize your watch so your life revolves around Nico, or maybe make your watchface a Printemps one instead!

This watchface features the following characters from Love Live!:
Maki Nishikino
Rin Hoshizora
Hanayo Koizumi
Honoka Kousaka
Kotori Minami
Umi Sonoda
Eli Ayase
Nozomi Tojo
Nico Yazawa

latest_release.release_notes:
Version 1.0 is the base release. Everything should be working as intended, but that's what they all say.

You will never escape idol hell!

data.title: Love Live! School Idol Watchface

data.author: AFSpeirs

changelog.release_notes: Updated images to work with Pebble 2 watches

Minor text amends.
Minor code improvements.
Fixed an issue where the background colour would not update if Power saver mode is enabled.
On days with a Custom Date enabled, eg Christmas Day or New Years day, will show the actual date on a flick/shake/tap of the watch
Fixed an issue with the date not appearing on black and white pebbles

Added a Power saver mode - Hides the time and date, until a flick/shake/tap of the watch
Added Bluetooth disconnection icon, and removed colour option.
Fixed issue with Boxing day not appearing correctly on the 26th December

Added Christmas Eve as a custom date
- It shows as "Xmas Eve" on Pebble Time Round watches, and "Christmas Eve" on everything else

Added custom date option
Fixed rare issue of quiet time and battery icon overlapping

Removed support for Emery watches (Pebble Time 2)
Removed support for battery icon levels - It will now only indicate low power
Realigned battery icon to better match the location of the Quiet Time icon
Added Quiet Time icon
Added toggle to vibrate during Quiet Time on Bluetooth disconnection
Added support for Pebble Time 2
Fixed an issue where the battery icon was not showing correctly
Minor change to the language used in the Bluetooth section of settings page

Added a version number to the config page.
Updated the battery icon section of settings page to read better.
Removed custom date options

Tweaked the layout of the configuration page
Added support for more custom text:
 - Burns Night (25th January)
 - Boxing Day (26th December)


Known Issues:
 - The Halloween custom text does not work as intended (It shows then hides quickly when the watchface is loaded). I would advise not selecting this in the configuration page untill a fix is found.
Re-included support for custom text

data.description:
A simple digital watchface.

Designed to not be overly complex and give you access to the information you need (time and date).


Features:
  • Bluetooth disconnection alert - Will notify you when you are no longer connected to your phone (via a vibration) and the top and bottom text will change colour (configurable in the settings).
  • Configurable colours - The Hour, Minute, Date and background's colours are configurable 
  • Battery icon support - A battery icon will appear when the battery level becomes low (Configurable in the settings).
  • Custom events support - The currently supported events are; New Year's Day, Burns Night, Halloween, Christmas Eve, Christmas Day, Boxing Day.
  • Power Saver mode - Hides the time and date, until a flick/shake/tap of the watch
  • Quick View support

latest_release.release_notes: Updated images to work with Pebble 2 watches

data.title: Simply Digital

data.author: Nicko Guyer

changelog.release_notes: Battery optimizations

- New color scheme
- Tweaked style for increased readability
- Added step count (requires Pebble Health)
- Screen refresh rate automatically drops to once per minute while sleeping - second hand disabled (requires Pebble Health)

data.description:
HYBRID_01 is designed for quick readability. The digital time and date are easy to read at a glance, and the analog minute ring and second hand give a visual indicator of how much of the current minute and hour has elapsed. Today's step count is also displayed above the time. Automatic power savings reduce screen updates while you're asleep.

This is an early release of this watchface. More features such as temperature, customization are coming soon!

Donations are welcome at: https://paypal.me/nguyer
data.title: HYBRID_01

data.description:
Kiezel Watchfaces | Essential Hindi

This is a paid watch-face. You can purchase this face individually for $0.99 or purchase our entire collection of 20+ faces for $5.99. You can purchase within the settings page.

Essential brings the style of the Pebble smartwatch to your watchface. It is fully customizable. You can customize the colors of the icon fills, icon stroke, time text, text box, text box stroke, and the color. You can also toggle the date on/off and the weather on/off. Choose what temperature unit you want to see. Also it supports both 12hr time and 24hr time. Choose how often to update the weather to save on battery. Also included is vibrate on bluetooth disconnect and show b/w version on bluetooth disconnect.

NOTE: Those that don't have a license will be using a 24hr trial. After 24hrs, the face will go back to default black/white state.

Enjoy!

Kiezel-
data.title: Essential Hindi

changelog.release_notes: Show temperature in Fahrenheit or Celsius.

data.description:
The iClock watchface is simple and elegant. The analog clock face looks like the face of an apple watch. With a double tap of your wrist you will get more informations for 5 seconds and the backlight will be activated. In the corners you see the battery state, a step counter, weather informations of your current location and a second time zone.

In the right buttom corner you have the following options. A further weather symbol for the forecast in 6 hours, the current temperature (in Fahrenheit or Celsius) or a second timezone.

You get a lot of settings to create your personal appearance of the iClock watchface.

latest_release.release_notes: Show temperature in Fahrenheit or Celsius.

data.author: ibrokemy.computer

changelog.release_notes: Added Pebble Time support. Color options coming soon.

data.description:
***FREE for the first 10 people to install it. Simply use the discount code "TRYITOUT" at checkout. Please let me know if you have any problems with using the new KiezelPay feature.***

This is the PAID version of my first Pebble watchface. The trial period will last 1 hour, after which you will need to pay for the watchface.

This simplistic watchface features a minimal vertical battery meter, Wunderground weather (I find it to be more accurate than OpenWeather) with PDC icons, time and date. 

Settings page allows for inverting the color, 12/24hr time, and C/F temperature units. It also allows you to add a custom location for the weather (useful if you have GPS disabled on your device.) I will soon be adding a weather update interval, but for now it is set to 30 minutes.

A free API key from https://wunderground.com/weather/api is required to make the weather work, otherwise only the time/date/battery are shown. 

Please give it a heart if you like it, and I will gladly try to fulfill requests.

Thank you very very much for donating!

latest_release.release_notes: Added Pebble Time support. Color options coming soon.

data.title: Wunder Weather: Donate

data.author: ibrokemy.computer

changelog.release_notes: Added support for Pebble Time and Time Steel. Color options coming soon.

data.description:
This is the free version of Wunder Weather. Features a minimal vertical battery meter, Wunderground weather (I find it to be more accurate than OpenWeather) with PDC icons, time and date. 

Settings page allows for inverting the color, 12/24hr time, and C/F temperature units. It also allows you to add a custom location for the weather (useful if you have GPS disabled on your device.) Weather updates every 30 minutes, but 15/30/60 min intervals will be included soon.

A free API key from https://wunderground.com/weather/api is required to make the weather work, otherwise only the time/date/battery are shown. 

Please give it a heart if you like it, and I will gladly try to fulfill requests. A "donate" version of this watchface is available at "pebble://appstore/574661d496f915e89f000020" (Wunder Weather Donate) , so if you find yourself using this every day please consider purchasing it for $1.

latest_release.release_notes: Added support for Pebble Time and Time Steel. Color options coming soon.

data.title: Wunder Weather

changelog.release_notes: It's cold outside. Zeiteisen now uses a signed data typed variable to display negative temperatures as well. ;)

- Vibration feature on bluetooth lost now configurable
- Not more than one vibration in five mins on BT lost
- Minimal (and still pretty ugly) Pebble 2 compatibility

- More colorful hour hand
- Slightly better visible hour markers
- More than three taps per minute are ignored
- Sleep-display's background in battery-level-color
- Fixed sleep-time wakeup detection
- Minor issues

- Show weather forecast's timestamp
- New dark gray watchface theme
- More careful access to weather service
- Watchface notifications
- Fixed some minor bugs

- Observe "Pebble Health" data to detect watch-wearer is sleeping
- Allow a raw estimation of "battery hours remaining" w/o any data
- Corrected a minor issue with the configuration dialog on Android

- Slightly bigger minute markers
- More precise battery remaining time
- Colored second hand
- Weather forecast for the next 24 hours
- Fixed some minor issues
- Estimate remaining battery hours
- Minor bug fixes

- New date format options
- A few minor updates that you didn't even know you needed

- Spanish and french translations (only weekday on watchface)
- Bluetooth icon position on Pebble Time/Time Steel corrected
- Configuration dialog completely translated to german

- Several temperature units
- More careful access to weather service
First public release.

data.description:
The style of this elegant analog watchface is carefully modeled on a classic wrist watch. Supports english, french, german and spanish.

Weather is taken from your phone's location by default, or can be manually configured by city name and country code (in case you've denied access to location service). Uses weather forecasts up to 24 hours when your Pebble is running without bluetooth.

You can choose between a lot of temperature units in configurations dialog: Fahrenheit, Celsius, Delisle, Kelvin, Newton, Rankine, Réaumur, Rømer.

While watch-wearer is sleeping (detected by "Pebble Health"), watchface is automatically switched-off to save energy.

The second hand is hidden by default. Shake your wrist to show it for a few seconds. You can configure the second hand to be permanently visible, but this will drain your Pebble's battery more quickly.

You can configure "No date" watchface complication, or "Date only", or "Weekday and date" (only on Time Round) in the configurations dialog.

The estimated remaining battery hours can optionally be displayed. And there is a battery meter painted in green, yellow or red colors (depending on the Pebble's battery level) between the minute markers at the bottom of the watchface. I find this a pretty cool feature. :)

There is a bluetooth icon appearing and double-vibrating when bluetooth connection with phone has been lost.

And there is more to come! BTW: If you love this watchface as much as I do, please give it a <3. Thx.

latest_release.release_notes: It's cold outside. Zeiteisen now uses a signed data typed variable to display negative temperatures as well. ;)

data.title: Zeiteisen

data.description:
Simple, but all information are displayed without button operation.

Second hand is displayed for about one minutes when shaken.
Date changes its position on the dial so that it is not hidden by hands.
Battery level is always displayed by ticks on the dial.
When Bluetooth is disconnected, watch vibrates and date will turn red.
When charging, ticks on the dial turn red.
Watch face is redrawn on every 10 seconds, so that you can read the time below the precision of one minutes.
Color around the dial changes on every 10 seconds.

latest_release.release_notes: Width of the color ring is adjusted (to the original width)  on Pebble Round.

changelog.release_notes: minor fix of missing minus sign font.
Fixed retry logic when weather.gov failed (particularly outside of US) to openweather.org.
Fixed initializing weather update causing LOADING.. all the time.

Text adjustments and Bug fixes.
Added Diorite build for Pebble 2.

Changed Weather provider from OpenWeather to Weather.gov. possibly improve weather condition accuracy (I hope Pebble SDK officially provide weather API).
Fixed problem Clock hands and info are disappeared when back from notification.

Date font changed to more readable one.
Bluetooth indicator possibly fixed.

Fix redraw delay issue when Color configuration updated.
Display of Pebble Health Steps is configurable.
First release.

data.description:
Analog Clock watchface with Date, Weather and Health Steps, Bluetooth indicator. All Color configurable.

Because of Weather provider inaccuracy, now it uses Weather.gov as a default provider, then try OpenWeatherMap.org for fallback. Data cached for 10 minutes, and automatically updated in every 30 minutes.

Please try "Zirconia" watchface if you're looking for Analog watch with similar functions.

data.description:
It's a time and weather watchface with analog design.

At the top of the watchface it shows the current temperature and condition.

Below it displays a 3 days forecast of the max. temperatures and conditions.

With a shake of your wrist the forecast of today and tomorrow is shown in detail: Morning, noon, and afternoon conditions.

Weather info by Yahoo and openweathermap, updates every 30 minutes.

Settings:
- Choose dark or light color scheme
- Weather display can be switched off
- Units C or F
- Show watchface circle
data.title: TmWeather

data.author: Game Time

changelog.release_notes: An API Key is now required for weather updates. The free API Key can be obtained from openweathermap.org.
-Fire Emblem GT 1.0

data.description:
Welcome to Fire Emblem GT!

Based on Fire Emblem for the Gameboy Advance.

Features:

Animated Heroes - Choose between Eliwood, Lyn, and Hector and enjoy their critical hit animation each hour.

Hourly Vibration - A quick vibration occurs each hour right when your hero lands their critical hit. Can be turned on and off in the settings.

Weather Condition and Temperature - Weather requires a free API key from Openweathermap.org. There's icons for the weather condition and the current temperature will be displayed and updated every 30 minutes. Use the GPS on your phone or type in your own city if GPS is unavailable.

Battery Life - Your watches battery life will be displayed on the bottom right by percentage and the health bar for your hero.

Step Goal - Setup your own step goal, once your step goal is set you can view your progress in the bottom left hand corner via completion percentage and the enemies health bar. 

Day and Night Background - From 6am to 6pm a vibrant warm background will be displayed, from 6pm to 6am a calm cool background will be displayed.

If you enjoyed this watchface please leave a heart and share it among fellow Pebblers.

latest_release.release_notes: An API Key is now required for weather updates. The free API Key can be obtained from openweathermap.org.

data.title: Fire Emblem GT

data.author: chops

changelog.release_notes:
added pebble language support
updated small menu icons

data.description:
5 jul:
added pebble language support
updated small menu icons

Another of my city building watchfaces.  This is just a generic building image, however each hour during the day (6am to midnight) the sky changes.

Early on some hot air balloons float by, during the day a plane flies over, and at night stars come out and the building lights turn on.

The watchface is NOT animated - it's just that with images changing each hour it may give that impression.

The sky state is simply based on your local time - no complex maths involved to calculate sun position etc.  As such it is fixed re what you see and does not change per daylight savings and so on.

Weather info by Yahoo! and updates half hourly - if you select "use GPS" the temp/city name will reflect your current location.  When your watch is not connected clouds will show in the sky over the buildings.

Available for all pebble watches.

latest_release.release_notes:
added pebble language support
updated small menu icons

data.description: Simple, customizable, low power usage watchface. Match your pebble to what you're wearing every day. A simple shake of your hand unveils for 2s the battery charge, a customizable, second timezone and the steps you've been taken.

changelog.release_notes: First release and publish

data.description:
The best watchface for discreetly tracking your pregnancy.

Features
- Standard watchface (information disabled until you need it)
- Smart motion enabled information
- Number of weeks pregnant
- Days, hours, minute and seconds countdown to your due date
- Size of your baby compared to fruit and vegetables
- Estimated size of your baby in centimetres
- Battery level displayed as a line
- Weather information
- Bluetooth disconnection indicator
 
To display the baby and weather information centre the watch so the screen is level/perfectly horizontal and then roll your wrist backwards.

To display only the weather information centre the watch so the screen is level/perfectly horizontal and then lift your wrist 90 degrees to the left. 

Information is displayed for 10 seconds.

** please note that the watchface needs to return to the level/horizontal position before you can show the information again, this is to save battery and stop the information appearing when not required **
data.title: Due Date

data.description:
$0.99 USD
Design and Art Direction by Paul Joel - www.pauljoel.com

Introducing Business Time, the watchface to suit your business needs! A simple yet elegant design that can be customised to your liking.

Key features:
- Day / Date / Time / GPS Location.
- Option to turn GPS Location on or off.
- When disconnected from phone or no internet connection the GPS Location will be replaced with the word 'Pebble'.
- Anti-aliasing digital text.
- Weather temperature and forecast icon.
- Watch battery percentage.
- Automatic watch battery colours.
- Bluetooth icon connection.
- Step count and distance.
- Display up to four timezones.
- Custom text.
- Custom colours.
- Display health information: Step count, distance walked, and calories


Available for the following languages:
- English
- Français
- Deutsch
- Español
- Italiano
- Português
- Český
- Nederlands
- Català

After installing Business Time you will have a three days trial period to explore all the features and different aspects. At the end of the trial if you like Business Time and want to keep it, it's just $0.99 via KiezelPay payment system. You will be prompted to enter code and follow easy payment steps. Once purchased, the watchface is yours permanently, no matter what Pebble or phone you use, as long as you keep the same Pebble account.

You can also buy Business Time straight away via the 'Buy Now' button within the app.

Made by Pebble watch users and enthusiasts.

latest_release.release_notes: Hide leading zeros in secondary timezones if needed

data.title: Business Time

data.description:
This is a paid watch-face. You can purchase this face individually for $0.99 or purchase our entire collection of 20+ faces for $5.99. You can purchase within the settings page.

If you love our faces, give us a heart to let us know!

In dedication of the very first digital watch, the Pulsar, we completely redesigned our Digital Classic face to bring the new Pebble Health features as a primary focus. We think your watch-face should help motivate you in living a healthier life. That’s why we’ve integrated goal setting into this face. Pick your goal and focus daily on reaching your goal so you can live healthier. We also know that users love having other information on their faces, and that’s why we’ve included complications like weather, alternate timezone, date, and battery.

And as always with Kiezel faces, color presets and the ability to customize all the colors to your liking.

Enjoy!

Team Kiezel-

changelog.release_notes: With this release, there's a small branding in the center of the watchface, right under the center.
With 1.3 release, there's yet another twist - there's a small circle in the center that looks like a mounting screw for hands on physical watch.

This update contains 2 small improvements:
- a small dot appears now in the area of midnight hour
- seconds hand moves a little bit off the center, which resembles how hands were fitted in traditional watches

This is very simple watchface based on default tic tic designed and tested using CSS/JSX (React) and exported into C programming language.

If you want to create your own one with different colors please visit: https://pjsx.pl/tictoc.html

You can choose from two behaviors:

- Doomguy tracks your activity. If you don't move Doom Guy will die :( if your daily activity is 1000 steps above average you will reach God Mode!!!

Look how Doom Guy looks around when you shake your pebble.

Things to come:

data.description:
Cool watchface with maze-like appearance showing time.
Shake the watch and you get seconds and date.
It is coded to preserve the battery, meaning seconds are not tracked until you shake watch, and not tracked after timeout. In simple words - you don't have to worry about your battery.

 Completely configurable. You can configure:
 - Different maze backgrounds
 - shake-to-date on/off, shake-to-seconds on/off (for even more battery saving, if you don't need seconds and/or date)
 - time how long date/seconds will show
 - time and background color (color pebbles only)
 - bluetooth connection vibration alarm
 - bluetooth status icon (only when disconnected)
 - battery icon (off, on 10%, on 10% and 20% with different icons)
 - date format
 - Croatian localisaton (this one is for myself)
 
 support for oldschool B/W Pebble and Pebble Time (Square).
 No Pebble Round support yet.
 As I only have original B/W Pebble, I only tested color features in emulator, so I apologize for any bugs that I missed. I hope color features look nice.
data.title: A Maze

data.author: weaversway
data.description:

Shake for pointless time.

Requires Pebble firmware v3.12 or later.

data.description:
Another Star Wars image based watchface - this one using a Tie Fighter.  

Time is shown by "lit" areas on the spacecraft.
The sections on the wing viewed on the left show the hours, the one on the right shows the single minutes and the sections of the "window" in the body shows the 10-minutes.  The center of the left wing lights up to show PM.

Battery level is shown by the laser beams in 10% sections (repeated for the pairs of laser beams).  10 - 40% at the top (red laser beams being fired at the Tie Fighter from behind) 50 - 100% at the bottom (green laser beams being fired by the Tie Fighter).

Note. When Quick Views shown the battery indicators are not displayed. 

Screenshots: 
(1) 12:59PM (100% battery)
(2)  9:43AM (30%)
(3)  6:26PM (70%)
(4)  1:00AM (10%)
(5)  8:24AM (with Quick View)

Designed by Peter Fletcher, who has designed watches for Tokyoflash and a number of the faces I have published. The watchface is published with his permission.

Note. Tie Fighters are a trademark & copyright of Disney & Lucasfilm Ltd.
data.title: Tie Fighter

data.description:
Say Hi to the Island Crab! This digital watchface features:

•	12 or 24-hour time based on Pebble settings
•	Hourly weather updates from OpenWeather.org. 
o	To manually refresh the weather, just navigate to another screen and back.
•	The Bluetooth monitor will show “Disconnected” when the connection is lost.
•	The island is a battery meter! It will sink as your battery gets low. If you see your crab in the water, give it a charge to get your island back.
•	Settings page will allow you to change temperature to Celsius and set manual location for weather. After you save, just navigate to another screen and back to see the change. 

Feel free to email with suggestions or if you like us, give us a heart <(^.^)>

data.description:
Simple analog watchface with battery and connection status. 

The hands and markings are cloned from Engineering watchface by @nguyer. I have added a large date number that is easier to read. 

On the top the a battery status bar is shown if selected in the configuration. It is meant to be only one pixel high to dominate the watchface as little as possible. When the battery reaches 20 percent or less the percent is shown in the lower right corner. 

The watchface can be configured to inverse when bluetooth connection is lost. If inverse is not selected an icon is shown in the lower left corner when bluetooth is disconnected. It can also vibrate two short pulses on disconnect.

latest_release.release_notes: Fixed critical bug in configuration indexes which made vibrate impossible to turn off.

data.description:
This is a paid watchface. Payment is done through Kiezelpay and the face costs $1 + local taxes where applicable.

Dot Addition is a semi-cryptic, sleek looking watchface. To read it, just remember that each column represents a digit of a 24 hour time. For example, the GIF screenshot reads 15:28PM. 

There are many customisable options available. All colours can be changed, numbers can be shown on either the top or bottom of the digit stack, and either time or date can be shown as these numbers.

There will be updates of this watchface to come in the future!

data.description: Inspired by a classic watch. It shows hour, minute, second (if you like), date and a multi functional extra dial. The extra dial can be configured to - disappear from the watchface - work as a 24-hour dial which turns once a day, noon is at at position 6. Perfect for cave explorers. - track your activity either steps or time, your daily goal can be configured as well (this for sure needs a supporting Pebble watch and access to Pebble Health). You will start at noon (0%) and will hopefully end at noon (100%). - show a second time zone, just configure the desired difference in minutes. With this feature you can take a journey to even the craziest time zones on our planet. Seconds dial and date display can also be switched on or off, whatever fits your mood. If the Bluetooth connection breaks, the crown changes its color (2nd image). Battery status is realized with the seconds hand (if switched on). Below 40% remaining battery it starts to move every two seconds. Below 30% it moves every 3 seconds and below 20% the dial only moves every 5 seconds.
data.title: Rulez

data.author: weaversway

data.description: Zero Hour watch face with colors that change on the hour.  Displays the hour on the main watch face, and then a shake of the wrist will show the full time.
data.title: Zero Escape

data.description: Let the Pokémon Sun and Moon hype begin! This simple watchface features the Pokémon Moon logo with day of the week and date along with an analog face.
data.title: Pokemon Moon Analog
